
# Setup Config

``` {r setup}
# File's path (change if necessary)
file_name <- "Metiloma_CP_PlanilhaINCA(1).xlsx" # The name of the file
folder <- "Planilhas" # Which folder the file is located
file_path <- file.path(folder, file_name) # Concatenate file name + folder 
num_col <- 5
num_row <- 8
```

# Data Loading and Cleaning

``` {r data_loading}

data$Target <- data[[selected_col]]
```
